p: A series of t-tests, performed for each fatty acid on each pair of samples from the same cv/site between the two growing years, showed a significant difference between the years 2010 and 2011 in a few cases only, namely: all acids except C16:1 varied in Ancomarzio SI and Iride AG; only the acids C18:1, C18:2 and C18:3 varied in Ciccio EN ( Table 3).
